name: Gub-Ball!
description:
Can you survive through all eight levels of this snappy arcade game that's questionably similar to Breakout? More importantly, can you beat your own high score?

so yeah i made this solely to learn Godot lmao. I'm unable to thoroughly test the Mac version and have no way to even test the Linux version, so please leave a comment if you run into any issues with them OTL
